subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jack McKeon, Florida’s new 80-year-old manager, earned his first victory since coming out of retirement when the Marlins broke an 11-game losing streak by beating the Los Angeles Angels, 5-2.
snippet: Jack McKeon, Florida’s new 80-year-old manager, earned his first victory since coming out of retirement when the Marlins broke an 11-game losing streak by beating the Los Angeles Angels, 5-2.
